|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WC-BCTD; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905X3 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G31 @650MHz (OpenGL ES 3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: eMMC 5.0 connector, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC Card slot *RAM: 4GB (DDR4) @2666MHz *USB: 4x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *LAN: 1x GbE LAN port
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-c4/odroid-c4 ''ODROID-C4'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/04/23/50-odroid-c4-raspberry-pi-4-competitor-combines-amlogic-s905x3-soc-with-4gb-ram/ ''ODROID-C4 Raspberry Pi 4 Competitor'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/odroid-c4-could-be-the-odroid-youre-looking-for/ ''Odroid-C4 could be the Odroid you’re looking for'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==See also== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-C4]] - ''Amlogic'' S905X3 4-cores ARM Cortex-A55 CPU @2.0GHz <!-- *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU -->
